name: Nest-dashing-widget
body:
Nest Dashing Widget =================== Nest widget for [Dashing](http://shopify.github.com/dashing) ## Dependencies Add the `nest_thermostat` to the Gemfile of your Dashing dashboard: ```ruby gem 'nest_thermostat' ``` and run `bundle install`. ## Installation To login to your nest account setup both the `NEST_USER` and `NEST_PASSWORD` environment variables ## Usage To use this widget, copy `nest.coffee`, `nest.html` and `nest.scss` into the `/widgets/nest` directory of your dashboard. Copy `nest_logo.png` and `nest_leaf.png` into the `/assets/images` directory and put the `nest.rb` file in your `/jobs` folder.
